pricing: Price isn’t strategy— but dumb price kills strategy. Anchor on value, segment smart, protect premium SKUs.
cogs: COGS = Direct Materials + Labor + Overheads. Sensitivity: metals, semis, and energy swing margins violently.
working_capital: Cash lives in the balance sheet. Squeeze DSO, stretch DPO (ethically), and don’t drown in inventory.
risk: Track the top-5: supply disruption, warranty/recall, FX, credit exposure, demand shocks.
cash_flow: EBITDA is not cash. Cash = ops discipline: AR collection, capex timing, inventory turn.
margin: Gross-to-net is a blood sport: promo, structural allowances, freight, returns. Model them explicitly.
inventory: Finished goods vs WIP vs raw. Don’t ‘optimize’ to a stock-out — service levels pay the bills.
